## OverDrive - Library eBooks & Audiobooks

### What is OverDrive?

OverDrive is a digital content service provided by libraries worldwide where users can borrow eBooks, audiobooks, and other media straight from their device. With over 50,000 libraries and schools connected with OverDrive, users can access a wide range of digital content available for borrowing. 

### How Does OverDrive Work?

To use OverDrive, users need to have a valid library card from a participating library. Once a user has a library card, they can download the OverDrive app on their device, including their smartphone, tablet, e-reader, or computer. Once the app is installed, users can access their library's collection of eBooks, audiobooks, and other digital media. 

Users can borrow digital content for a specific period, usually for 14 days, before it is automatically returned. Users can also place holds for popular items and receive an email when they become available for borrowing. 

### Benefits of Using OverDrive

One of the primary benefits of using OverDrive is the convenience of borrowing eBooks and audiobooks from your local library without having to physically visit the library. Users can access a wide range of digital media from the comfort of their own homes. 

Furthermore, OverDrive is free to use with a valid library card. With OverDrive, users can save money on purchasing eBooks and audiobooks, which can prove to be quite costly. 

### OverDrive App Features

The OverDrive app has several features that make borrowing eBooks and audiobooks more accessible and convenient. These features include: 

- Easy access to a wide range of digital media
- Search and browse for titles by subject, author, or genre
- Place holds on popular titles
- Read or listen to content offline
- Sync reading positions, bookmarks, and highlights across devices
- Customize font size and background color for better readability
- Stream audiobooks without having to download them

### Conclusion

OverDrive is an excellent tool for borrowing eBooks and audiobooks from your local library without having to leave the comfort of your own home. With a vast collection of digital content and a user-friendly app, OverDrive is an easy and cost-effective way to access the media you want. So, if you're a fan of eBooks or audiobooks, be sure to check out OverDrive today!
